00034 bool Connection::MatchesSource(const Connection &rhs) const
00035 {
00036   if (src==IP_ADDRESS_ANY || rhs.src==IP_ADDRESS_ANY) {
00037     if (srcport==PORT_ANY || rhs.srcport==PORT_ANY) {
00038       return true;
00039     } else {
00040       return srcport==rhs.srcport;
00041     }
00042   } else if (src==rhs.src) {
00043     if (srcport==PORT_ANY || rhs.srcport==PORT_ANY) {
00044       return true;
00045     } else {
00046       return srcport==rhs.srcport;
00047     }
00048   } else {
00049     return false;
00050   }
00051 }
00052 
00053 bool Connection::MatchesDest(const Connection &rhs) const
00054 {
00055   if (dest==IP_ADDRESS_ANY || rhs.dest==IP_ADDRESS_ANY) {
00056     if (destport==PORT_ANY || rhs.destport==PORT_ANY) {
00057       return true;
00058     } else {
00059       return destport==rhs.destport;
00060     }
00061   } else if (dest==rhs.dest) {
00062     if (destport==PORT_ANY || rhs.destport==PORT_ANY) {
00063       return true;
00064     } else {
00065       return destport==rhs.destport;
00066     }
00067   } else {
00068     return false;
00069   }
00070 }
00071 
00072 bool Connection::MatchesProtocol(const Connection &rhs) const
00073 {
00074   return rhs.protocol==protocol;
00075 }
00076 
00077 bool Connection::Matches(const Connection &rhs) const
00078 {
00079   return MatchesSource(rhs) && MatchesDest(rhs) && MatchesProtocol(rhs);
00080 }

00082 
00083 void Connection::Serialize(const int fd) const
00084 {
00085   src.Serialize(fd);
00086   dest.Serialize(fd);
00087   if (writeall(fd,(const char*)&srcport,sizeof(srcport))!=sizeof(srcport)) {
00088     throw SerializationException();
00089   }
00090   if (writeall(fd,(const char*)&destport,sizeof(destport))!=sizeof(destport)) {
00091     throw SerializationException();
00092   }
00093   if (writeall(fd,(const char*)&protocol,sizeof(protocol))!=sizeof(protocol)) {
00094     throw SerializationException();
00095   }
00096 }
00097 
00098 void Connection::Unserialize(const int fd)
00099 {
00100   src.Unserialize(fd);
00101   dest.Unserialize(fd);
00102   if (readall(fd,(char*)&srcport,sizeof(srcport))!=sizeof(srcport)) {
00103     throw SerializationException();
00104   }
00105   if (readall(fd,(char*)&destport,sizeof(destport))!=sizeof(destport)) {
00106     throw SerializationException();
00107   }
00108   if (readall(fd,(char*)&protocol,sizeof(protocol))!=sizeof(protocol)) {
00109     throw SerializationException();
00110   }
00111 }

00114 {

00116       << ", dest="<<dest<<":"<<destport
00117       << ", protocol="<<((int)protocol)<<")";

00153 void SockRequestResponse::Serialize(const int fd) const
00154 {
00155   int t=(int) type;
00156   if (writeall(fd,(const char*)&t,sizeof(int))!=sizeof(int)) {
00157     throw SerializationException();
00158   }
00159   connection.Serialize(fd);
00160   data.Serialize(fd);
00161   if (writeall(fd,(const char*)&bytes,sizeof(unsigned))!=sizeof(unsigned)) {
00162     throw SerializationException();
00163   }
00164   if (writeall(fd,(const char*)&error,sizeof(int))!=sizeof(int)) {
00165     throw SerializationException();
00166   }
00167 }

00179     throw SerializationException();

00186 std::ostream & SockRequestResponse::Print(std::ostream &rhs) const
00187 {
00188   rhs << "SockRequestResponse(type=";
00189   rhs << (type==ACCEPT ? "ACCEPT" :
00190           type==CONNECT ? "CONNECT" :
00191           type==WRITE ? "WRITE" :
00192           type==FORWARD ? "FORWARD" :
00193           type==CLOSE ? "CLOSE" :
00194           type==STATUS ? "STATUS" :
00195           "UNKNOWN");

00197   rhs << ", data=" << data;
00198   rhs << ", bytes=" << bytes;
00199   rhs << ", error=" << error ;
00200   rhs << ")";
00201   return rhs;

00273 void SockLibRequestResponse::Serialize(const int fd) const
00274 {
00275   int t=(int) type;
00276   if (writeall(fd,(const char*)&t,sizeof(int))!=sizeof(int)) {
00277     throw SerializationException();
00278   }
00279   connection.Serialize(fd);
00280   if (writeall(fd,(const char*)&sockfd,sizeof(unsigned))!=sizeof(unsigned)) {
00281     throw SerializationException();
00282   }
00283   data.Serialize(fd);
00284   if (writeall(fd,(const char*)&bytes,sizeof(unsigned))!=sizeof(unsigned)) {
00285     throw SerializationException();
00286   }
00287   if (writeall(fd,(const char*)&error,sizeof(int))!=sizeof(int)) {
00288     throw SerializationException();
00289   }
00290   if (writeall(fd,(const char*)&readfds,sizeof(fd_set))!=sizeof(fd_set)) {
00291     throw SerializationException();
00292   }
00293   if (writeall(fd,(const char*)&writefds,sizeof(fd_set))!=sizeof(fd_set)) {
00294     throw SerializationException();
00295   }
00296   if (writeall(fd,(const char*)&writefds,sizeof(fd_set))!=sizeof(fd_set)) {
00297     throw SerializationException();
00298   }
00299 }

00301 void SockLibRequestResponse::Unserialize(const int fd)
00302 {
00303   int t;
00304   if (readall(fd,(char*)&t,sizeof(int))!=sizeof(int)) {
00305     throw SerializationException();
00306   }
00307   type=(slrrType)t;
00308   connection.Unserialize(fd);
00309   if (readall(fd,(char*)&sockfd,sizeof(unsigned))!=sizeof(unsigned)) {
00310     throw SerializationException();
00311   }
00312   data.Unserialize(fd);
00313   if (readall(fd,(char*)&bytes,sizeof(unsigned))!=sizeof(unsigned)) {
00314     throw SerializationException();
00315   }
00316   if (readall(fd,(char*)&error,sizeof(int))!=sizeof(int)) {
00317     throw SerializationException();
00318   }
00319   if (readall(fd,(char*)&readfds,sizeof(fd_set))!=sizeof(fd_set)) {
00320     throw SerializationException();
00321   }
00322   if (readall(fd,(char*)&writefds,sizeof(fd_set))!=sizeof(fd_set)) {
00323     throw SerializationException();
00324   }
00325   if (readall(fd,(char*)&exceptfds,sizeof(fd_set))!=sizeof(fd_set)) {
00326     throw SerializationException();
00327   }

00330 std::ostream & SockLibRequestResponse::Print(std::ostream &rhs) const
00331 {

00334           type==mBIND ? "BIND" :

00336           type==mACCEPT ? "ACCEPT" :
00337           type==mCONNECT ? "CONNECT" :

00339           type==mWRITE ? "WRITE" :
00340           type==mRECVFROM ? "RECVFROM" :

00343           type==mSELECT ? "SELECT" :
00344           type==mPOLL ? "POLL" :
00345           type==mSET_BLOCKING ? "SET_BLOCKING" :
00346           type==mSET_NONBLOCKING ? "SET_NONBLOCKING" :
00347           type==mCAN_WRITE_NOW ? "CAN_WRITE_NOW" :
00348           type==mCAN_READ_NOW ? "CAN_READ_NOW" :
00349           type==mSTATUS ? "STATUS" :
00350           "UNKNOWN");
